If the standard poodle is 8 inches taller than the miniature poodle, then the miniature poodle is 28-8=<<28-8=19>>19 inches tall.
And if the miniature poodle is 8 inches taller than the toy poodle, that the toy poodle is 19-6=<<19-6=13>>13 inches tall.
